divs: sighting detailson a normal route with post-office mail, ie from peterborough to kings lynn norfolk, noticed brilliant illumination of coloured lights less than quarter a mile away. the road i was travelling on (the a47) was unaturally lacking traffic, the time was approaching 2045, the normal time i usually reached this part of the road system. i first observed on closer inspection, now only yards away. a object quite static and settled upon the field to my right. i instictively slowed the post-office vehicle down to a stop and looking through the drivers side-window saw the following,, { now some 25ft away) a cage shaped multi-coloured highly luminous object. about 8ftsquare. there was a very noticeable sequence of lights rotating around its bars..and they pulsated in green\blue\red fashion, that is to say each independent bar on this cage-formation turned on and off at great speed. at this point i decided to take a closer look. after releasing the foot-security door-lever i pulled the door open and stepped out. again :supisiously: there was no car movement moving up or down this a47 road, there was no audible sound whatsoever. i proceeded across towards the fields fence so was then approx 18 or twenty feet from this :object?: my right eye was smarting terribly and i needed to rub it to move the blur from my sight. i stopped unafraid and observed. there was no top or bottom to this object just the rotating bars around its cubed form. it was roughly 8ftsquare. the lights had dimmed or i imagined they had, again no sound just colour. after perhaps two-mins the craft? rose upward, again without sound. it ascended to forty feet and then dissapeared, as though into a time-corridoor. the weather conditions were perfect. no clouds clear wonderful night sky. the craft\object did not ascend up into the heavens, i watched it de-materialise. for a moment i collected my thoughts then returned back to my van.still there was no traffic. i resumed a steady drive to kings lynn sorting office and said nothing to no one about the experience.
Summary: Whilst driving post security van noticed very illuminated object to my right landed as it were to the edge of a field, slowed down van to investigate.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in King's Lynn
There were no other sightings in King's Lynn on or around September 3rd 1983
